entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Hearst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
